description: Late at night when the city sleeps, the Onyx and the Redz begin their day. For a long time, these tribes are at odds with each other. The Onyx is a wild bunch that loves to engage their victims in bondage games and nasty corporal punishment. On the other hand, the Redz is a peaceful tribe that enjoys bondage play only for the sensual aspect. When Derrek Diamond a member of the Redz falls into Onyx Spencer Reed's trap, things get interesting...
title: The Onyx and The Redz
